en.tutor1_text: Tap on the workers to kiss when the boss is not looking at them.
en.tutor2_text: Be carefull!! Sometimes the boss will look at them.
en.tutor3_text: The game ends when the boss knows about your love affair.
en.bg_failed_text: She was more impressed with your boss. Try harder!
en.bg_normal_text: You almost get her!! Try harder!!
